title: M. Night Shyamalan’s Servant Gets a Release Date on Apple TV+
text:
Is there anything more upsetting that hyperrealistic baby dolls? M. Night Shyamalan thinks not. Thursday night at New York City Comic Con, Apple TV+ dropped the trailer and release date for Servant, the new series from Shyamalan and Tony Basgallop. Servant follows grieving couple in Philadelphia (natch) who unthinkingly let something spooky into their lives while trying to cope with loss. The series stars Lauren Ambrose, Toby Kebbell, Nell Tiger Free, and Rupert Grint. Servant premieres on Apple TV+ November 28.

Related
description: M. Night Shyamalan’s Servant will drop on Apple TV+ November 28. The show stars Lauren Ambrose, Toby Kebbell, Nell Tiger Free, and Rupert Grint. Tony Basgallop created the series and served as executive producer.
